sentence: The image is an advertisement for a "4 Day Carnival Cruise" to the Bahamas.
sentence_cn: 该图是前往巴哈马的“4 天嘉年华邮轮”的广告。

sentence: It features three images of large, luxurious cruise ships on the ocean, arranged in a stylish geometric layout.
sentence_cn: 该作品以三艘海上大型豪华游轮的图像为特色，以时尚的几何布局排列。

sentence: At the top, the text reads "Exclusively Caribbean Vacations" in elegant gold script.
sentence_cn: 顶部用优雅的金色字体写着“专属加勒比假期”。

sentence: Below, in bold blue letters, it announces the "4 Day Carnival Cruise" to the Bahamas.
sentence_cn: 下面用蓝色粗体字标明了前往巴哈马的“4天嘉年华游轮”行程。
游轮将于“2 月 9 日星期日下午 4 点”出发。

sentence: The cost "starting at $249" is highlighted in a blue circle, and there is a note stating a "$25 deposit to reserve a cabin due by September 30th."
sentence_cn: 费用“起价 249 美元”以蓝色圆圈突出显示，并有一条注释写着“预订客舱需支付 25 美元押金，截止日期为 9 月 30 日”。
words: $25 deposit to reserve a cabin due by September 30th.

sentence: - Spectacular stage shows and lots of live entertainment
sentence_cn: - 精彩的舞台表演和众多现场娱乐表演
- 船上活动的完整日程表
- 泳池、漩涡浴池和水滑梯

sentence: For more information, a contact number and email, "1-866-643-5886" and "KAREN@EXCLUSIVECARIBBEANVACATIONS.COM," are provided, along with credits to the designers at "www.VIP-CO.com."
sentence_cn: 欲了解更多信息，请访问“www.VIP-CO.com”获取联系电话和电子邮箱“1-866-643-5886”和“KAREN@EXCLUSIVECARIBBEANVACATIONS.COM”，并注明设计师姓名。

sentence: The design includes a dot pattern on part of the background, adding to the visual appeal.
sentence_cn: 该设计在背景部分包含一个点状图案，增加了视觉吸引力。
